Class FieldData<I,O>

java.lang.Object
org.spongepowered.configurate.objectmapping.FieldData<I,O>
Type Parameters:
I - intermediate type
O - container type
public abstract class FieldData<I,O> extends Object
Holder for field-specific information.

4.0.0
